full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI CHAS 'BUL MCHOD PHRENG DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI CHAS 'BUL MCHOD PHRENG DANG BCAS 'DI, RANG NYID MOS PAS PHYAG MTSAN SOGS GSAR BSKRUN GYI 'BUL BA'I TSIG RTZOM 'DOD YOD PA NYE CHAR RTA NAG SDEB LUNG SHAR PA'I RIGS RGYUD SLOB BU DBU MDZAD PHUN TSOGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I RKYEN GYIS, DAM PA'I MING 'CHANG BAS BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG GIS SO, ,)
